title: [Neuroscience] Aromatherapy during sleep increases cognitive capacity by 226% in older adults, an effect thought to be mediated by improved integrity of the prefrontal cortexâ€™s uncinate fasciculus, a pathway directly linked to memory

[Health] A large-scale study confirms that fructose is a lead driver of obesity. Fructose lowers active energy, damaging mitochondria - much like the fructose ingested in large quantities by animals preparing to hibernate.
